text:
The latest release 1.8.1 implementation of Assertion Result component now 
outputs everythinh (HTML included) it received from the web server. It's make 
it painful to follow the path of hit URLs.

A nice thing to do would be to implemented a setting to turn off/on verbose 
output for this component.


Another problem with the new verbose output is that now JMeter can potentially 
consumes a lot of memory that it can't release to display all returned HTML 
data. There seemed to be no wait to limit the amount of kept HTML data.
creator: sgilbert@sinc.ca
